name: taktube
description: elegram bot for upload video to youtube channel

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token. Get from https://t.me/botfather

CLIENT_ID.description: Your Google CLIENT_ID. Refer project docs.

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your Google CLIENT_SECRET. Refer project docs.

BOT_OWNER.description: Telegram id of the bot owner.

AUTH_USERS.description: Telegram id of authorised users, separated by comma
